Congo votes in extended election as opposition calls for rerunThe Democratic Republic of Congo voted on Thursday on the second day of a chaotic and in parts violent general election after authorities extended opening hours for polling stations that failed to open the previous day. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 08:21:02 GMT 6RTHLP7IDJPKRD3INAKLXRY5OM https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-votes-extended-election-opposition-calls-rerun-2023-12-21/Reuters世界非洲
Urban school farm opens world of opportunity to British teensThe rural life of rearing rare breed sheep and nurturing alpacas is a world away for many urban teenagers. Yet a British school near Liverpool has opened its pupils to a wealth of jobs in agriculture and the benefits of nature with its own farm. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 08:18:45 GMT ESM6KFEGQRKIFCHDOTTTVOIZ7M https://www.reuters.com/world/uk/urban-school-farm-opens-world-opportunity-british-teens-2023-12-21/Phil Noble, Andy Bruce世界英国
Rift deepens between the Philippines, China over South China SeaRelations between Manila and Beijing have soured under Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr, with Manila pivoting back towards the United States which supports the Southeast Asian nation in its maritime disputes with China. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 07:56:23 GMT RY2XM5CTEBKSPMD3Q3ZFEYJUKA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/rift-deepens- Between-the-philippines-china-over-south-china-sea-2023-12-21/Reuters世界亚太地区
UN's WFP temporarily suspends food assistance in parts of SudanThe United Nations' World Food Programme (WFP) has temporarily suspended food assistance in some parts of Sudan's state of Gezira as fighting spreads south and east of Sudan's capital Khartoum, the aid agency said in a statement on Wednesday. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 07:48:03 GMT G27L5DCBWFMJHHUPXEKFGRUFZU https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/uns-wfp-temporarily-suspend-food-assistance-parts-sudan-2023-12-21/Reuters世界非洲
Polish parliament votes for court reform resolutionPoland's parliament voted for a resolution seeking changes in the National Council of the Judiciary (NCJ), as the new government attempts to undo reforms by the previous administration that critics say politicised the courts. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 07:38:08 GMT KPB2AFAKQFPYTFD5SG765FQP2E https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/polish-parliament-votes-court-reform-resolution-2023-12-21/Reuters世界欧洲
Uruguay's migrant population grows for first time in a century, driven by Venezuelans, CubansFor the first time since mass European migration to the Americas at the turn of the 20th century, the number of foreigners living in Uruguay is on the rise, this time driven by a wave of arrivals from Venezuela and Cuba. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 07:13:19 GMT UDLZKS5ZYBICPCHDMUKNCEYD2A https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/uruguays-migrant-population-grows-for-first-time- century-driven-by-venezuelans-2023-12-21/Lucinda Elliott世界美洲
Ukrainian town faces tough winter, a year after driving out Russian forcesThe few remaining residents in the devastated eastern Ukrainian town of Lyman are preparing for a difficult winter as snow falls and the temperature drops. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 07:04:45 GMT JBKBTKRUPNLQTN5UBC3SZHRJJI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukrainian-town-faces-tough-winter-year-after-driven-out-Russian-forces-2023-12-21/Vitalii Hnidyi, Thomas Peter, Max Hunder世界欧洲
Explainer: How could North Korea use its nuclear weapons?North Korean leader Kim Jong Un said a missile test this week shows his country would not hesitate to launch a nuclear attack if an enemy provokes it with strategic weapons, as observers say he is moving to make such forces operational. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 06:52:30 GMT OVQCDZHJBRKMJHE6TYTQYM6FMU https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/how-could-north-korea-use-its-nuclear-weapons-2023-12-21/Josh Smith世界亚太地区
Bail denied to Hong Kong rights lawyer in landmark security caseA Hong Kong court on Thursday rejected a fresh bail application for pro-democracy activist and lawyer Chow Hang-tung, whose subversion trial under a China-imposed national security law is expected to open in late 2024. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 06:24:32 GMT 6PLSZQJ6EJIGVCACIHSQI3U7VY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/bail-denied-hong-kong-rights-lawyer-landmark-security-case-2023-12-21/Jessie Pang, Dorothy Kam世界中国
Japan protests South Korean Supreme Court ruling on forced labour compensationSouth Korea's Supreme Court on Thursday upheld rulings ordering two Japanese companies to compensate South Koreans who were forced to work under Japan's 1910-1945 occupation, a decision that immediately sparked a protest by Tokyo. Thu, 21 Dec 2023 06:20:34 GMT DLBYPKUQNFJITCV5TEXLBDRDQE https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/japan-protests-south-korean-supreme-court-ruling-forced-labour-compensation-2023-12-21/Hyunsu Yim, Mariko Katsumura世界亚太地区
Ukraine shoots down 34 out of 35 Russian drones - air forceUkraine's air defence shot down 34 out of 35 Russian drones launched in a major overnight attack on 12 Ukrainian regions, the air force said on Thursday.
